The Care Industries We Serve

OneTouch works across a wide range of care settings and industries

Home

One seamless platform to deliver business-critical efficiencies in your specific care setting

At OneTouch, we specialise in providing a digital care planning software platform that can be tailored to most of the unique needs of the many various care settings in the care industry. Our care management system is highly configurable and as such is flexible enough to ensure smooth operations, enhanced service delivery, and improved outcomes whatever type of care you provide.

OneTouch has been built from the very beginning to be a single system, so information is shared simply, and without loss or interruption, across all key stakeholders involved in an individual’s care delivery circle. This means that all your reporting, rostering, digital care planning, finance and HR are all connected and accessed one password, on one platform. Explore how OneTouch can support your specific industry:

Home Care (Domiciliary Care)

Home care providers deliver essential support to clients in the comfort of their own homes. OneTouch enhances the efficiency and effectiveness of home care services with tools like:

  • Reducing the administrative burden
  • Improving the coordination of care
  • Enabling better care outcomes

Learn more about how OneTouch supports home care providers.

Residential Care

Managing a residential care facility involves juggling many responsibilities. OneTouch simplifies these tasks with features that include:

  • Person centred resident care planning
  • Compliance and Governance tracking and management

Discover how OneTouch can improve your residential care facility.

Reablement Care Services

Reablement care focuses on helping clients regain independence. OneTouch supports this process through:

  • Goal-Oriented Care Planning
  • Streamlined care collaboration
  • Adjustable schedules

Explore how OneTouch enhances reablement care services.

Learning Disability Support Services

Providing care for individuals with learning disabilities requires specialized tools. OneTouch caters to these needs by offering:

  • Streamlined scheduling
  • Service User progress monitoring
  • Proactive management tools

Find out how OneTouch supports learning disability services.

Day Care Services

Day care services play a vital role in providing daytime support. OneTouch improves the delivery of these services with:

  • Streamlined communications
  • Client safety tools
  • User engagement

See how OneTouch benefits day care service operators.

Disability Support Services

Caring for individuals with disabilities demands careful coordination. OneTouch aids in delivering high-quality disability services through:

  • Skill based scheduling
  • Simplified billing
  • Carer app for carers on the go

Learn more about OneTouch for disability services.

Transform Your Care Operations with OneTouch

No matter your care setting, OneTouch is designed to help you deliver exceptional care with ease. Visit the individual pages for each industry to see how OneTouch can support your specific needs.

Book a demo
Get in touch
